definition: to bless/to cherish/to take good care of/to conserve

sentences.english: Take time out each day to take very special care of yourself.
sentences.chinese: 每一天空出些时间来给你自己特别的呵护。

sentences.english: Treat them with a special hand cream.
sentences.chinese: 用特别的护手霜来呵护双手。

sentences.english: Psychologists and psychiatrists say that children should be handled with care.
sentences.chinese: 心理学家和精神病专家说孩子需要小心呵护。

sentences.english: Believe in me . I will take care of your fragile heart .
sentences.chinese: 相信我，我会小心翼翼去呵护你那易碎的心。

sentences.english: Yes, sure they should be but not at the cost of disrespecting their elders.
sentences.chinese: 但是对他们的呵护不能以对长辈的无礼为代价。

sentences.english: I can feel the cells drinking in this gentle skin loving cream.
sentences.chinese: 我可以感受到细胞吸收这些温和的呵护皮肤的乳霜。

sentences.english: Only the care of a parent to do all that filial piety is the real.
sentences.chinese: 只有呵护了父母心去做的一切，才是真正的孝顺。

sentences.english: With same PH value as tear, it features extremely mild nature, and can protect the tender eye skin.
sentences.chinese: 其酸碱值与泪水相同，性质温和，呵护幼嫩眼部肌肤。

sentences.english: Lotus Fairy Lake in cross-strait people live under the care of a happy and peaceful life.
sentences.chinese: 湖两岸百姓在莲花仙子的呵护下过着美满祥和的生活。

sentences.english: He tends the flower beds and evergreens that he has planted in the driveway.
sentences.chinese: 他总是细心呵护着种植在车道边的花圃和常青树。

sentences.english: Husband, protect at you I gained flesh three, that clausal chain is some tight.
sentences.chinese: 老公，在你呵护下我长胖了三斤，那条项链有些紧。

sentences.english: Zhou Jianwei with mother spoil love grow up, develop aggressive personality.
sentences.chinese: 周健伟在母亲的溺爱呵护下长大，养成好胜的性格。

sentences.english: She caresses the Chen Yuan ground that lets get hurt considerately softly times feeling is warm.
sentences.chinese: 她温柔体贴的呵护让受伤的陈元地倍感温暖。

sentences.english: Farmer Lumpy proudly protects his giant ear of corn from a hungry crow!
sentences.chinese: 大傻鹿用尽所有心血去呵护他种出来的超级玉米。

sentences.english: Take care your health, Maxsun Mattress bring your enjoyable life.
sentences.chinese: 美神床垫更懂得呵护身体，更让你完美享受。

sentences.english: In many ways, Leonard was Woolf's caretaker.
sentences.chinese: 从许多方面说来，他都是吴尔芙的呵护者。

definition: to cherish/to treasure/to take care of/to love and protect
to show concern and care for
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
to show every possible consideration (idiom); meticulous care
to take care of/to show consideration/to attend to/to look after
the utmost care (idiom); to look after sb in every possible way
to the utmost/in every possible way
to tend/to take care of sb
